China's Ban on Game Consoles Lifted

Jan 8, 2014

China's Ban on Game Consoles Lifted

Lucy O'Brien:

China’s ban on video game consoles was temporarily lifted today, making them available to consumers living in the region after 14 years.

Fascinating. And given a strong rollout by both Microsoft and Sony, it looks to me that console gaming is still alive and well.
